from math import *
t = int(input())
lst = []
for i in range(t):
    lst.append(int(input()))
for q in lst:
    if q > 13 or q % 2 == 0:
        col2 = ceil((q - q // 3) / 2)
        col1 = col2 + 1
        col3 = q - col1 - col2
        print(col2, col1, col3)
    elif q == 7:
        print(2, 4, 1)
    else:
        col2 = q // 2 - q % (q // 2)
        col1 = q // 2
        print(col2, col1, q - col2 - col1)

n = int(input())
l = []
for i in range(n):
    a = int(input())
    l.append(a)
for j in l:
    x = j // 3 + 1
    y = (j - x) // 2 + 1
    if x == y:
        x = x + 1
    z = j - x - y
    if z <= 0:
        z = 1
        y = j - x - 1
    print(y, x, z)

n = int(input())
ans = []
for i in range(n):
    m = int(input())
    if m % 3 == 0:
        a1 = int(m / 3) + 1
        a2 = int(m / 3)
        a3 = int(m / 3) - 1
    elif m % 3 == 1:
        a1 = int(m / 3) + 2
        a2 = int(m / 3) + 1
        a3 = int(m / 3) - 2
    else:
        a1 = int(m / 3) + 2
        a2 = int(m / 3) + 1
        a3 = int(m / 3) - 1
    if a3 == 0 and a1 > a2 + 1:
        a1 -= 1
        a3 += 1
    elif a3 == 0:
        a2 -= 1
        a3 += 1
    ans.append([a2, a1, a3])
for i in ans:
    for j in i:
        print(j, end=' ')
    print()

from math import ceil
t = int(input())
lst = []
for i in range(t):
    lst.append(int(input()))
for j in lst:
    if j > 13 or j % 2 == 0:
        col2 = ceil((j - j // 3) / 2)
        col1 = col2 + 1
        col3 = j - col1 - col2
        print(col2, col1, col3)
    elif j == 7:
        print(2, 4, 1)
    else:
        col2 = j // 2 - j % (j // 2)
        col1 = j // 2
        print(col2, col1, j - col2 - col1)
